title: Jim Caldwell talks illegal bat, Lions' 0-4 start (VIDEO)
text: Jim Caldwell talks illegal bat, Lions' 0-4 start OCT 06, 12:47 am Lions coach Jim Caldwell talks about the illegal bat and other reasons Detroit is off to an 0-4 start.
